Warranty
 Bicyclebuys.com will process any manufacturers warranty on any product we sell. Warranty claims need to be made to customer support at bicyclebuys.com. All warranty claims will be assessed based on the manufacturer's guidelines. Please call us at 1-888-4-Bike-Buy (1-888-424-5328, 631-673-2211) or e-mail your questions to info@bicyclebuys.com.

Returns
 The Buyer is responsible for return shipping costs in the event of a return. On Free Shipping orders, only the first order is free. Any exchanges or returns are the responsibility of the customer. All returns need to be in the original packaging in a new resellable condition (Within 15 days of receiving if you elect not to keep the product). We will price protect merchandise (if we reduce the price on our site) for a period of 30 days from the time of sale. The price difference will be a store credit. Shipping damage requires a claim to be filed with the shipping carrier. A picture and documentatiion needs to be taken at the time of receipt of the merchandise from the carrier. A restocking fee may be assessed in the event the product does not come back in its original condition with original packaging. Customer is responsible for shipping cost.

Store Security
 Shopping at Bicyclebuys.com has been designed to make your shopping fun and safe.. Here are the reasons why: All of your credit card and address information is encrypted before it is sent over the Internet.

We use the best known techniques to protect your personal information. If for any reason you do not want to send your credit card information over the internet, you can call in your credit card after you start your order online at 888 4 Bike Buy or you can FAX (1-631-673-2220) the entire order by choosing the "Print Order..." option after you enter your shipping infomation at checkout time.

The Secure Server encrypts your credit card number, name, and address. Encryption converts the text and numbers you submit into undecipherable text. Example: It would convert the name "Sally" to a character string like this: [f3l3kdkcofd64...dtsnd676sqdlvzs753].

Also most banks either cover all the charges that result from unauthorized use of your credit card or may limit your liability to just $50.

If your bank holds you liable, Bicyclebuys.com will cover your liability up to $50 provided that the unauthorized use of your credit card resulted through no fault of your own from purchases made at Bicyclebuys.com.

This guarantee covers a maximum liability of $50. If you suspect unauthorized use of your credit card, you must notify your credit card provider in accordance with its reporting rules and procedures immediately.

Purchase Agreement
 Bicyclebuys.com strongly recommends that the assembly of your new bicycle be performed by a reputable bicycle repair shop with knowledge of the manufacturer's specifications. As a purchaser of bicycle equipment, I assume the full responsibility of carefully assembling my bicycle according to the manufacturer's instructions and specifications, and always checking my bike and related equipment before a ride. I fully understand the hazards involved in the sport of cycling. As in all extreme sports, bodily injury is a possibility at any given time.

It is incumbent upon me to continuously check my equipment, especially the quick releases and brakes. All quick releases must be checked to make sure they are tight. Failure to do so might lead to failure on the ride. Proper tire inflation is important. Tires need to be checked for tears or worn tread. Allen bolts need to be tight. New bikes should be taken to a professional bike shop to be checked if not assembled by one. Proper lighting equipment and reflectors are very important for personal safety. They should be installed and in place on every ride.

By placing my order I explicitly agree to the provisions of the customer agreement and release Bicyclebuys.com from all liability whatsoever except for the shipment of the order I have placed. In no event shall the liability of Bicyclebuys.com be greater than the total amount of my purchase. Additionally, I understand and acknowledge that it is my responsibility to follow the manufacturer's instructions in connection with the assembly of the bicycle and to follow cycling safety guidelines and all local laws regarding cycling and cycling safety. It is recommended that you have a reputable bike shop with knowledge of the manufacturer's specifications perform the assembly.

Always wear your helmet and proper safety equipment. Bicycle riding can lead to serious accidents. Even with the proper use of safety gear, you could be seriously injured or killed. Bicycle racing, riding, and training can have the same risks as motorcycling, and you assume a large risk with similar speeds and hazards. Fully approved helmets are strongly recommended whenever riding.
